questions.question: 1. WHY FREDDIE MERCURY COULD FINALLY JOIN THE BAND?

choices.answer: because he showed his exceptional voice and he didn’t give up.
because Freddie was a poor boy
because their teeth were different
because he wanted it with all his heart

questions.question: 2.WHY QUEEN WAS CONSIDERED A DIFFERENT BAND, ACCORDING TO THEMSELVES?

choices.answer: because they dressed different.
because they were poor misfit boys.
because Freddie had an exceptional voice and he dressed different.
because they were different compared to other bands.

questions.question: 3. WHY WAS Bohemian Rhapsody CONSIDERED A DIFFERENT SONG?

choices.answer: because the song was very long for radio station.
because the song was composed by Freddie Mercury.
because it was not understood
because it was a rock song with the impact of the Opera, and Greek Tragedy.

questions.question: 4. WHAT DOES Bohemian Rhapsody MEAN FOR THE BAND?

choices.answer: “Bohemian Rhapsody” means a Fantasy.
“Bohemian Rhapsody” means Galileo Figaro
“Bohemian Rhapsody” means an Epic Poem.
“Bohemian Rhapsody” means Bismillah.

questions.question: 5. WHAT DID THE SONG "WE WILL ROCK YOU" ESPECIALLY HAVE?

choices.answer: It especially had the voice of Freddie Mercury.
It especially had opera.
It especially had sounds created by all the members of the band.
It especially had the sound of the guitar.

questions.question: 6. WHEN FREDDIE MERCURY DECIDED TO RETURN TO THE BAND HOW HE DID RECOGNIZE HIS MISTAKES?

choices.answer: He said he was conceited, selfish and an idiot.
He said he was idiot.
He said he was selfish and an idiot.
He said he was a bad boy, a crazy and sincere man.

questions.question: 7. HOW DID FREDDIE MERCURY UNDERSTAND THE IMPORTANCE OF WORKING AS A TEAM?

choices.answer: all the members of the group worked fine.
all in their difference were unique and all the members contributed.
he was unique and he had a wonderful voice.
his band was wonderful.

questions.question: HOW DID THE OTHER MEMBERS OF THE BAND UNDERSTAND FREDDIE'S MISTAKES?

choices.answer: They were not true friends.
They didn't want Freddie Mercury to come back to the band.
They hated to Freddie Mercury.
They accepted Freddie's apology and showed that they were true friends.

questions.question: 9. WHAT AGREEMENT DID THE BAND DO WHEN THEY RECONCILED?

choices.answer: They never reconciled with Freddie.
They reconciled with him.
They decided to share everything equally.
They didn’t decide to share everything equally.

questions.question: 10. WHO WANTED TO HELP WITH THE LIVE AID CONCERT, WHERE THEY WERE RECOGNIZED AS THE BEST BAND?

choices.answer: The band wanted to help to people from Africa.
The Live Aid concert wanted to help to people from Africa.
The Lived Aid concert just wanted to show rock bands.
The band wanted to have money.
